sections.heading: Rejection of contracts and leases on liquidation6-395
sections.text: 08.Rejection of contracts and leases on liquidationThe receiver may at his election reject any executory contract to which the bank is a party or any obligation of the bank as a lessee of real or personal property. The claim of a lessor for damag
